description: Non-material amendment to 20/01923/OUT to allow the removal of reference to the maximum permissible building height of six storeys, together with amendment to Condition 1, and the approved Parameter Plans, is also required to ensure that the RMA does not conflict with an approved set of Parameter Plans.
